review: Have had for 2 days and works great.  Clear pictures and have used Netflix, Pandora, Youtube, Amazon videos.Did have a problem initially, where I had to move my wireless router.  The fire stick needs to be pretty close to router in order to work without skipping. Moved it right next to TV and worked great.  Excited to keep using it and try out all of the other apps.
author: Jack Gibson

review: very easy to install and set up.
author: Chet Freegard

review: Super easy to set up and guide through the apps.
author: Amy

review: Great product with plenty of options
author: Mark G Allen

review: Made my not smart TV a Smart TV..Best $39 investment for my families home entertainment ....
author: gordon l baldwin

review: Great product, come in handy for watching my own YouTube videos on the big screen
author: Marcus Fitzgerald

review: Really convent and easy set up, only down side is now I am super tempted to buy amazon prime
author: Brooklyn

review: Love the Fire TV Stick. So far I've used it to catch up on a lot of shows and watch movies when there is nothing else on TV (I have Prime).  I will be return my stick only because my best friend bought one for me for Christmas and I don't need two items it has nothing to do with the actual device.
author: Patti Kanouse "Sewing 4 Trish"

review: Lots of issues so far. Hoping some updates in the future will fix it. Guess that's what I get for ordering with the first batch to go out.
author: Samantha Howie
